scripts.app:prod: NODE_ENV=production concurrently --kill-others "pnpm --prefix ./server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.app:dev: set NODE_ENV=development&&concurrently --kill-others "pnpm --prefix ./server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.app:install: pnpm install && pnpm --prefix ./server install && pnpm --prefix ./client install
